Container.Name: TorBoxTinfoilServer
Container.Overview: The TorBox Tinfoil Server allows you to download torrents directly through Tinfoil using TorBox.

Config.Name: TorBox API Key
Config.Description: Your TorBox API key. Find at https://torbox.app/settings.

Config.Name: Auth Username
Config.Description: The username to be used when logging in to the server from Tinfoil.

Config.Name: Auth Password
Config.Description: The password to be used when logging in to the server from Tinfoil.

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: The internal port of the server.

Config.Name: Switch UID
Config.Description: The specific switch UID which you want to lock the server to.
